name: Lexy's Labyrinth Level
summary: A C2M file is a game level used by Lexy's Labyrinth, an open-source, updated version of Chip's Challenge. It contains text and binary data Lexy's Labyrinth uses to load the level. The text data comprises the level's clues; the binary data comprises the rest of the level's structure. Players can create C2M files using Lexy's Labyrinth's Create tool.
